txt.en: Listen to the conversation
Greet Khûldim Umûn
Listen to the conversation
Listen to the conversation
'Yes, I am back, and this time my friend is with me.'
Listen to Khûldim Umûn
Talk to Girhâzi
'You should care because my friend is a powerful warrior who has slain countless Ordâkhai.'
'Do you know why you were left here, and did not go with the rest of the army?'
'It is because you are weak.'
Girhâzi has an idea for how to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of the lost archive, and she needs your help.
'...and stood with the Host of the West at the Black Gate.'
Listen to the conversation
'My friend, on the other hand, is a hero of the Pelennor...'
'[placeholder] has slain many, and has no problem slaying one more.'
'Do I? What do you think [placeholder]?'
Girhâzi has a plan to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of Dubarâkh, and has asked you to go along with whatever she is saying.
Girhâzi has a plan to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of Dubarâkh, and has asked you to go along with whatever she is saying.
<rgb=#00FF00>Wave</rgb> at Khûldim Umûn
Girhâzi has a plan to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of Dubarâkh, and has asked you to go along with whatever she is saying.
'Remember, just go along along with whatever I am saying.'
<rgb=#00FF00>Flex</rgb> at Khûldim Umûn
'Back again, Shêgudam?'
'I am bored with our chats.'
<rgb=#00FF00>Pose</rgb> for Khûldim Umûn
'They are very repetitive.'
'I am surprised you have friends.'
<rgb=#00FF00>Challenge</rgb> Khûldim Umûn to trial by combat
'But why should I care?'
Girhâzi has a plan to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of Dubarâkh, and has asked you to go along with whatever she is saying.
Show Khûldim Umûn that you are powerful
<rgb=#00FF00>Clap</rgb> for Khûldim Umûn's decision
'No! No, you do not need to do that.'
'It is in a mine!'
Girhâzi has a plan to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of Dubarâkh, and has asked you to go along with whatever she is saying.
'A salt mine, to the north of here.'
Show Khûldim Umûn how courageous you are
'I can mark where it is on a map.'
Listen to the conversation
Challenge Khûldim Umûn to single combat
Girhâzi has a plan to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of Dubarâkh, and has asked you to go along with whatever she is saying.
Listen to the conversation
Applaud Khûldim Umûn for his decision
Talk to Girhâzi
Girhâzi has a plan to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of Dubarâkh. You should talk to her.
You have led Agalûnu to Shanthar's abode in the wooded grove of Arwáth. You should talk to Agalûnu.
Listen to Khûldim Umûn

Girhâzi signals that she wants to talk to you, but makes no effort to keep her words unheard by Khûldim Umûn.\n\n'I was planning on ransoming him and sending him back to his family once we learned where the archive is, but if he is not going to tell us, what do you think of giving the people of Ambarûl what they want? Public executions are so distasteful though. We could even make it a fair fight, you against him. It would end the same.'
Girhâzi has a plan to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of Dubarâkh, and has asked you to go along with whatever she is saying.
Girhâzi grins at you.\n\n'Come, [placeholder], we are done here for now.'
